name: Goodbye Charlie
overview: COMPUTE! 1983/11 (Issue #42). Originally written for the unexpanded VIC. It is a dark, stormy night with howling winds and bolts of lightening. You've got to get home, the fastest way is through the cemetery. Since you don't believe in ghosts, you won't have to worry about them. But e graveyard is very old and there are lots of tombstones. you have to hurry, but you can't bump into a grave marker, because as you know stepping on a grave will cause you to be struck by lightening and then you'll be right at home. Use Q, A, S and Z for movement. L to light up the screen when you need to peek at the graveyard.
